Package nswalke4.smallbpayroll.util.database

Class DatabaseQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • nswalke4.smallbpayroll.util.database.DatabaseQueries
  • public class DatabaseQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an static class, giving the users the ability to access any of these commands without the necessity of creating a "DatabaseQueries" object. This handles the entire communication process with the database to ensure that the query/insertion is handled properly, and only opens/closes the connection for that specific query/ insertion to be sent through, keeping the connection time as minimal as possible.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DatabaseQueries()
      (NOT FOR USE) - The DatabaseQueries class contains static methods to be used by the SmallbPayrollApi to access and gather/add information from/to the database through only one command.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean addAccount​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String sub, PayPeriod.PayPeriodType periodType)
      Inserts the given information into the database as a new Account tuple.
      static boolean addHourlyEmployee​(Account account, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String phoneNum, double payRate)
      Inserts the given information plus the calculated employeeId into the database as a new Employee and Hourly_Employee tuple that should be attached to the given Account object.
      static boolean addPayPeriod​(Account account, java.sql.Date startDate)
      Inserts the given information plus the calculated endDate into the database as a new PayPeriod tuple that should be attached to the given Account object.
      static boolean addSalaryEmployee​(Account account, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String phoneNum, double payRate)
      Inserts the given information plus the calculated employeeId into the database as a new Employee and Salary_Employee tuple that should be attached to the given Account object.
      static boolean addTimecard​(Account account, java.lang.String employeeId, java.lang.String payPeriodId, double regHours, double overtimeHours, double bonusPay, double otherPay)
      Inserts the given information into the database as a new Timecard tuple that should be attached to the given Account, Employee, and PayPeriod object.
      static java.util.List<Account> getAllAccounts()
      Queries the database to gather all of the accounts tied to the database, creates Account Objects for each of them, and then returns an ArrayList of all of those Accounts.
      static java.util.List<Timecard> getAllEmployeeTimecards​(Employee employee)
      Queries the database to gather all of the timecard tuples attached to the given employee, creates new Timecard object for each of the tuples, and then returns an ArrayList of all of the Timecards attached to the given employee.
      static java.util.List<Timecard> getAllPayPeriodTimecards​(PayPeriod payPeriod)
      Queries the database to gather all of the timecard tuples attached to the given pay period, creates new Timecard object for each of the tuples, and then returns an ArrayList of all of the Timecards attached to the given pay period.
      static java.util.List<Employee> getEmployees​(Account account)
      Queries the database to gather all of the Employee accounts attached to the given Account, creates the HourlyEmployee or SalaryEmployee object representation based on the "emp_type" attribute, and then adds each employee to an ArrayList to be returned as the result.
      static int getNumEmployees​(Account account)
      Queries the database to gather the number of Employee accounts attached to the given Account and returns the result.
      static int getNumEmployeeTimecards​(Employee employee)
      Queries the database to gather the number of Timecards that are attached to the given Employee and returns the result.
      static int getNumPayPeriods​(Account account)
      Queries the database to gather the number of Pay Periods that are attached to the given Account and returns the result.
      static int getNumPayPeriodTimecards​(PayPeriod payPeriod)
      Queries the database to gather the number of Timecards that are attached to the given Pay Period and returns the result.
      static java.util.List<PayPeriod> getPayPeriods​(Account account)
      Queries the database to gather all of the different Pay Periods associated with the given account, creates PayPeriod object for each of the tuples, and then returns an array list of all of those PayPeriod objects.
      static Account getSpecificAccount​(java.lang.String sub)
      Queries the database to gather a specific account using the account's sub (which is generated by the AWS Cognito sign-in page) as the lookup parameter from the Payroll database.
      static Employee getSpecificEmployee​(java.lang.String employeeId)
      Queries the database to gather a specific employee using the given "employeeId" string to find the specific employee, and then return's the given hourly or salary employee object.
      static PayPeriod getSpecificPayPeriod​(java.lang.String payPeriodId)
      Queries the database to gather a specific pay period using the give "payPeriodId" string to find the specific pay period, and then return's the pay period object.

        public DatabaseQueries()
        (NOT FOR USE) - The DatabaseQueries class contains static methods to be used by the SmallbPayrollApi to access and gather/add information from/to the database through only one command.

    • Method Detail

      • addAccount

        public static boolean addAccount​(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String sub,
                                 PayPeriod.PayPeriodType periodType)
        Inserts the given information into the database as a new Account tuple. NOTE: This does not check if the insertion worked properly...
        Parameters:
        name - the business name / name of the account object/tuple
        email - the email associated with the account
        sub - the AWS Cognito generated sub (id) to signify the account being used
        periodType - the type of PayPeriod the account uses
        Returns:
        (T or F) the account was successfully added to the database

      • addHourlyEmployee

        public static boolean addHourlyEmployee​(Account account,
                                        java.lang.String firstName,
                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                        java.lang.String phoneNum,
                                        double payRate)
        Inserts the given information plus the calculated employeeId into the database as a new Employee and Hourly_Employee tuple that should be attached to the given Account object. NOTE: This does not check if the insertion worked properly...
        Parameters:
        account - the account to insert the employee into
        firstName - the first name of the employee
        lastName - the last name of the employee
        phoneNum - the phone number of the employee
        payRate - the pay rate of the hourly employee
        Returns:
        (T or F) the hourly employee was successfully added to the database

      • addSalaryEmployee

        public static boolean addSalaryEmployee​(Account account,
                                        java.lang.String firstName,
                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                        java.lang.String phoneNum,
                                        double payRate)
        Inserts the given information plus the calculated employeeId into the database as a new Employee and Salary_Employee tuple that should be attached to the given Account object. NOTE: This does not check if the insertion worked properly...
        Parameters:
        account - the account to insert the employee into
        firstName - the first name of the employee
        lastName - the last name of the employee
        phoneNum - the phone number of the employee
        payRate - the pay rate of the salary employee
        Returns:
        (T or F) the salary employee was successfully added to the database

      • addPayPeriod

        public static boolean addPayPeriod​(Account account,
                                   java.sql.Date startDate)
        Inserts the given information plus the calculated endDate into the database as a new PayPeriod tuple that should be attached to the given Account object. NOTE: This does not check if the insertion worked properly...
        Parameters:
        account - the account to attach the payPeriod to
        startDate - the start date of the payPeriod
        Returns:
        (T or F) the pay period was successfully added to the database

      • addTimecard

        public static boolean addTimecard​(Account account,
                                  java.lang.String employeeId,
                                  java.lang.String payPeriodId,
                                  double regHours,
                                  double overtimeHours,
                                  double bonusPay,
                                  double otherPay)
        Inserts the given information into the database as a new Timecard tuple that should be attached to the given Account, Employee, and PayPeriod object. NOTE: This does not check if the insertion worked properly...
        Parameters:
        account - the account to attach the timecard to
        employeeId - the id of the employee to attach the timecard to
        payPeriodId - the id of the payPeriod to attach the timercard to
        regHours - the number of regular hours worked (used by 'hourly')
        overtimeHours - the number of overtime hours worked (used by 'hourly')
        bonusPay - the amount of bonusPay given to the employee
        otherPay - the amount of otherPay given to the employee
        Returns:
        (T or F) the timecard was successfully added to the database

      • getAllAccounts

        public static java.util.List<Account> getAllAccounts()
        Queries the database to gather all of the accounts tied to the database, creates Account Objects for each of them, and then returns an ArrayList of all of those Accounts.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of all of the Account tuples in the database

      • getSpecificAccount

        public static Account getSpecificAccount​(java.lang.String sub)
        Queries the database to gather a specific account using the account's sub (which is generated by the AWS Cognito sign-in page) as the lookup parameter from the Payroll database.
        Parameters:
        sub - the AWS Cognito generated "sub" id to lookup the account tuple
        Returns:
        the Account object that matches the given "sub" in the database

      • getNumEmployees

        public static int getNumEmployees​(Account account)
        Queries the database to gather the number of Employee accounts attached to the given Account and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account object that the employees are tied to
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of Employees the account has

      • getEmployees

        public static java.util.List<Employee> getEmployees​(Account account)
        Queries the database to gather all of the Employee accounts attached to the given Account, creates the HourlyEmployee or SalaryEmployee object representation based on the "emp_type" attribute, and then adds each employee to an ArrayList to be returned as the result.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account object that the employees are tied to
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all of the employees attached to the given account

      • getNumPayPeriods

        public static int getNumPayPeriods​(Account account)
        Queries the database to gather the number of Pay Periods that are attached to the given Account and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account object that the pay periods are tied to
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of pay periods the account has

      • getPayPeriods

        public static java.util.List<PayPeriod> getPayPeriods​(Account account)
        Queries the database to gather all of the different Pay Periods associated with the given account, creates PayPeriod object for each of the tuples, and then returns an array list of all of those PayPeriod objects.
        Parameters:
        account - the account that the PayPeriods are tied to
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of PayPeriods that are all attached to the given account

      • getSpecificEmployee

        public static Employee getSpecificEmployee​(java.lang.String employeeId)
        Queries the database to gather a specific employee using the given "employeeId" string to find the specific employee, and then return's the given hourly or salary employee object.
        Parameters:
        employeeId - the id of the employee to find in the database
        Returns:
        the Employee object tied to the given employeeId string (or null)

      • getNumEmployeeTimecards

        public static int getNumEmployeeTimecards​(Employee employee)
        Queries the database to gather the number of Timecards that are attached to the given Employee and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        employee - the Employee object that the timecards are tied to
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of timecards the employee has

      • getAllEmployeeTimecards

        public static java.util.List<Timecard> getAllEmployeeTimecards​(Employee employee)
        Queries the database to gather all of the timecard tuples attached to the given employee, creates new Timecard object for each of the tuples, and then returns an ArrayList of all of the Timecards attached to the given employee.
        Parameters:
        employee - the employee to gather all Timecards from
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all of the Timecards attached to the given employee

      • getSpecificPayPeriod

        public static PayPeriod getSpecificPayPeriod​(java.lang.String payPeriodId)
        Queries the database to gather a specific pay period using the give "payPeriodId" string to find the specific pay period, and then return's the pay period object.
        Parameters:
        payPeriodId - the id of the pay period to find in the database
        Returns:
        the PayPeriod object tied to the given payPeriodId string (or null)

      • getNumPayPeriodTimecards

        public static int getNumPayPeriodTimecards​(PayPeriod payPeriod)
        Queries the database to gather the number of Timecards that are attached to the given Pay Period and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        payPeriod - the Pay Period object that the timecards are tied to
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of timecards the pay period has

      • getAllPayPeriodTimecards

        public static java.util.List<Timecard> getAllPayPeriodTimecards​(PayPeriod payPeriod)
        Queries the database to gather all of the timecard tuples attached to the given pay period, creates new Timecard object for each of the tuples, and then returns an ArrayList of all of the Timecards attached to the given pay period.
        Parameters:
        payPeriod - the payPeriod to gather all Timecards from
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all of the Timecards attached to the given payPeriod
